name: Garreth W. Tigwell
content: Garreth Tigwell | RIT RIT Logo with Text Garreth Tigwell Assistant Professor School of Information Golisano College of Computing and Information Sciences garreth.w.tigwell@rit.edu 585-475-6451 Office Hours Please email me to find out up-to-date information on my office hours. I tend to change them each semester to account for changes in my schedule.
